    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static LongTermMemory getInstance()

      • erase

        public void erase()
           throws LtmLtRtException
        Erases all memory.
        Throws:
        LtmLtRtException -
        +Cause ClosedLtRtException if long term memory already close
        +Cause ObjectPoolLtException if can't instantiate a new connection
        +Cause InterruptedException if interrupted while waiting for the connection
        +Cause SQLException if a database access error occurs, or this method is called on a closed connection

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        .

        This method can only be called from shutdown hook.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the thread is not from shutdown hook

      • registry

        public final <T extends LtmObjectModelling> java.lang.String registry(java.lang.Class<T> cLtm)
                                                               throws IllegalArgumentLtRtException,
                                                                      LtmLtRtException
        Parameters:
        cLtm -
        Returns:
        a unique identifier to the singleton instance (that can be used when calling 'fetch' or 'newObject')
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentLtRtException - if the data in parameter represents a configuration not allowed or already registered data with the same name
        LtmLtRtException -
        +Cause ClosedLtRtException if long term memory already close
        +Cause ObjectPoolLtException if can't instantiate a new connection
        +Cause InterruptedException if interrupted while waiting for a connection
        +Cause SQLException if a database access error occurs, this method is called on a closed connection, if one of the commands sent to the database fails to execute properly or attempts to return an unexpected result

      • registry

        public final java.lang.String registry(DescriptorData dData)
                                throws IllegalArgumentLtRtException,
                                       LtmLtRtException
        Parameters:
        dData -
        Returns:
        a unique identifier to use when calling 'fetch' or 'newObject' to get the singleton instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentLtRtException - if the data in parameter represents a configuration not allowed or already registered data with the same name
        LtmLtRtException -
        +Cause ClosedLtRtException if long term memory already close
        +Cause ObjectPoolLtException if can't instantiate a new connection
        +Cause InterruptedException if interrupted while waiting for a connection
        +Cause SQLException if a database access error occurs, this method is called on a closed connection, if one of the commands sent to the database fails to execute properly or attempts to return an unexpected result
